name: RoborockHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on roborock”
”Alexa, turn off roborock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To get started, "Enable Skill" in Alexa, link your Mi account and discover your devices. 
Use the device name to identify your device, you can change it in the Mi Home app.
Supported Devices: Roborock vacuum.
Supported Actions: turn on, turn off.
